pageOne.mymotto: 生活是一种绵延不绝的渴望,渴望不断上升,变得更伟大而高贵
pageOne.introduce: 我并不是计算机专业，但对前端很感兴趣，所以自学前端，来到这个充满激情的世界。

pageTwo.title: 关于我
bodyContent: 熟悉MVVM开发,深谙自动化,模块化开发之道
高效的自学能力,具备独立分析解决问题能力
强烈的自我驱动力,代码强迫症患者
愿意接受公司加班、任务进度追紧等工作模式

pageThree.title: 技能栈
pageThree.paragraphTwo: 前端的学习需要持之以恒，知识深度与广度
pageThree.paragraphThree: 重中之重就是原生javascript的理解
pageThree.paragraphFour: 如今的思路必需有模块化，组件化，工程化

帮助其他同事解决技术问题

前端性能优化

配合后端与UI完成新项目开发
项目主要为公司网站以及内部员工系统

item.title: 安徽美芝精密制造有限公司

生产车间自动化设备日点检、保养抽查

pageFive.title: 联系我
paragraphs: 学习是一个充实愉悦的过程
喜欢尝试，期待新鲜事物
前端即兴趣，兴趣即未来

pageOne.mymotto: Life is an endless longing, longing for ever-increasing, greater and noble
pageOne.introduce: I'm not a computer major, but I'm very interested in the front end, so I taught myself the front end and came to this passionate world

pageTwo.title: About Me
bodyContent: Familiar with MVVM development, well versed in automation and modular development
Efficient self-learning ability, ability to analyze and solve problems independently
Willing to accept the company's overtime, task schedules and other work modes

pageThree.title: Skills
pageThree.paragraphOne: Familiar with Vue ecology, vue-cli, vue-router, vuex etc
pageThree.paragraphTwo: Front-end learning needs perseverance, knowledge depth and breadth
pageThree.paragraphThree: The most important thing is the understanding of native javascript
pageThree.paragraphFour: Today's ideas must be modular, componentized and engineered

describe: Mainly responsible for the development of ERP back-management system

Help other colleagues solve technical problems
Front-end project construction, public components, method packaging, optimization, upgrade

The project is mainly for company website and internal staff system

item.title: Anhui Meizhi Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd
describe: (Non IT industry)
Production workshop automation equipment daily check and Maintenance spot check
Automatic production equipment troubleshooting, recording, feedback

pageFive.title: Contact
paragraphs: Learning is a full and joyful process
Like to try and look forward to new things
The front end is interest, interest is the future
There are good friends on the road，it's the shortcut
Looking forward to having the opportunity to work with you！
